title: The Legacy Journey: A Radical View of Biblical Wealth and Generosity
description: In  The Legacy Journey , Dave Ramsey takes a deep dive into God’s word, revealing the truth on money, wealth and how to build your personal and family legacy. It’s time to address the toxic messages in our culture that say we should be ashamed of the success God’s given us. You can truly live  and  leave a lasting legacy. Start your journey today! The  Legacy Journey  will show you:
author: Dave Ramsey
